title: Kannada actor Chetan to spend two days in jail, bail orders on Friday - The News Minute
content:
1. Kannada actor Chetan to spend two days in jail, bail orders on Friday  The News Minute
  2. Kannada actor by accident, activist by choice, Chetan to remain in jail on 39th birthday  The Indian Express
  3. Actor Chetan Kumar Arrested By Karnataka Police Over Tweet Against Judge Hearing Hijab Case  Live Law
  4. Kannada actor Chetan arrested for posts against HC judge  India TV News
  5. Popular Kannada actor Chetan Ahimsa arrested for tweet on HC judge hearing hijab case  ThePrint
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Kannada actor Chetan Kumar has been remanded in judicial custody after a local court posted the order on his bail application to Friday. He was arrested on Tuesday by the Sheshadripuram police, after they took suo motu cognisance of a tweet he had posted about one of the judges hearing the matter related to the hijab row. Arguing before the judge of the 8th Additional Chief Metropolitan Magistrate Court (ACMM) on Wednesday, the prosecutor for the state opposed his bail, saying he would create communal hatred if released on bail.
